categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: A female individual was the Princess of the Outer Rim planet Quanducial during the last century of the Galactic Republic. On one occasion during her time at that position she had to be evacuated from her residence and received help from Jedi Padawan Thame Cerulian, who intended to lower the Princess down the wall of the palace by using a grappling hook. Despite having the tested breaking point of 550 kilograms, however, the device broke during the attempt. Cerulian later recorded the event in his copy of the Jedi trainee guidebook The Jedi Path: A Manual for Students of the Force.
The Princess of Quanducial was first mentioned in The Jedi Path: A Manual for Students of the Force, a 2010 reference book written by Daniel Wallace.
